thread.title: Poets Ross Gay, Terrance Hayes nominated for National Book Award

title: Poets Ross Gay, Terrance Hayes nominated for National Book Award
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Education - Today 
Two poets with Pittsburgh connections were nominated today for this year's National Book Award....
